name: "Bullion" Bottle Opener - KIFU PARIS
description: The KIFU PARIS Bullion Bottle Opener, inspired by the shape of gold bars, is the ultimate luxury bar accessory. This item comes in a velvet pouch in White Shagreen. Handmade from Shagreen/Pen Shell and bronze-patina brass. Wipe clean with a soft dry cloth. Made in Philippines. Please note: All shagreen-covered items should be kept out of direct sunlight. Color variants may occur on the stingray and other exotic finishes.
